thread.title: Jas
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Jas

author: Jas
title: Jas
text: Hi, I've purchased Kayla Itsines 12 week Bikini Body guide today and received the guides within minutes, they're easy to read and follow, as I'm a total beginner there's a 4 week 'pre workout' plan as well. Its given me motivation to get into better shape (hopefully in time for summer!) using what seems to be a well researched and effective strategy!
